security.csp: default-src 'self' tauri: asset: https://17roco.qq.com; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' tauri: asset:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src https://fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' data: https: asset: tauri:; connect-src 'self' https://17roco.qq.com;
